name: Go Undercover with the Blues Quiz | Movies | 15 Questions

questions.text: What kind of food did Jeff feed his daughter at the beginning of the movie?
questions.explanation:
Jumbalaya.

	Jeff and Jane Blue are espionage agents in New Orleans on an extended vacation. They have an 11 month old daughter who is called Louise Jane by her mother and Jane Louise by her father. When the Blues are first introduced, they're crashing a party in New Orleans.

questions.text: What did Jeff tell the Newman's that he did for a living?
questions.explanation:
Brain Surgeon.

	He told the Newman's the reason why he quit was because the racket was getting to him and he kept dropping scalpels. It was then that Jane told them, she and Jeff were in espionage. The Newman's didn't believe that either.

questions.text: Who said this, "It was a fair fight. Two of them, two of us."
questions.explanation:
Jeff.

	Jeff said this in response to Jane's, "You took our child into a knife fight?"

questions.text: Who did Ted call to find out about Jeff Blue?
questions.explanation:
Dan Chesley.

	When Ted told him he was looking for information on Jefferson Blue, Dan started laughing hysterically over the phone. It turned out Jeff was hired twice by the FBI and fired each time. During his absence from the FBI, he worked with the CIA.

questions.text: What kind of burglar did Jeff say was sitting on their couch?
questions.explanation:
Literate.

	Jane: 'One guy on the couch reading.'  Jeff: 'A literate burglar. How refreshing.'  The supposed burglar turned out to be their boss, but Jeff didn't recognize him until he had already jumped on him.

questions.text: What did Jeff tell the bank robbers after he foiled the bank robbery?
options: 'You have something that belongs to me.'
questions.explanation:
'Buy American.'

	Jeff foiled the bank robbery by wrapping a chain around the bumper of the car so it couldn't go anywhere. Then he pretended to be the driver. He told Jane, 'People in a major hurry never look at the driver'.

questions.text: What was the name of the Spanish man that stalked Jeff throughout the movie?
questions.explanation:
Muerte.

	Stanley Tucci played the thief, Muerte. He stalked Jeff throughout the whole movie because Jeff beat him and his partner up during a attempted robbery. Jeff refers to Muerte as Morty.

questions.text: How many oysters did Jeff order for lunch?
questions.explanation:
6 dozen.

	Unfortunately, they didn't get to eat them because Paulina Novacek's people came after them at the same time Muerte did. Jeff ended up throwing the oysters at Novachek's people.

False.

	Jeff told Ted and Sergeant Halsey that he bribed the guy at the CIA and blackmailed the guy at the FBI so he could qualify at the shooting range.

questions.text: When did Jane tell Jeff he started walking for the first time?
questions.explanation:
Eighteen months old.

	Jeff was upset that their daughter wasn't walking yet at eleven months because he was walking younger than that age. Jane told him he was walking at a year and a half and his mother was getting ready to call in specialist.

questions.text: What part of the zoo did Jeff leave Muerte?
questions.explanation:
Alligator Pit.

	Jeff left Muerte on a tree in the alligator pit without pants or a coat. He then told the nuns not to miss the alligator pit.

questions.text: What was the first name Jeff finally decided they were going to give the baby after seeing Jane beat up Paulina Novachek?
questions.explanation:
Jane.

	All throughout the movie, Jeff was calling their daughter Jane Louise while Jane was calling her Louise Jane. She didn't think daughters should be named after their mothers.

questions.text: How many different ways did Jeff say Jane could kill a man with her hands?
questions.explanation:
3.

	Ted ended up staying behind while Jeff and Jane went to get Paulina.

questions.text: Paulina had to leave New Orleans of her own will.
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Paulina Novacek was going to start a nuclear war. There was no extradition so Jeff and Jane had to make sure Paulina left New Orleans on her own. The helicopter Paulina boarded, thinking she was going to be free, had police on it ready to take her back.

questions.text: What country did Jeff and Jane sail to at the end?
questions.explanation:
Cuba.

	Muerte boarded the boat with them. They left him in the ocean with a life saver after the boom knocked him into the water. Then Jane pointed in the direction of Cuba and they sailed off.
